sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { public banner=[ {img:"1.png",alt:"Img1"}, {img:"2.png",alt:"Img2"}, {img:"3.png",alt:"Img3"}, {img:"1.png",alt:"Img1"}, {img:"2.png",alt:"Img2"}, {img:"3.png",alt:"Img3"}, ] }
